Trigger: The user is hit by an attack.

Effect: The user freely uses Stealth Rock.

actions.name: Stone Surge
actions.description: Passive: When resolving Stealth Rock, the user can spend an additional 2 PP double the number of Hazards created.

actions.name: Stealth Rock
actions.description: Effect: The user places 5 floating rock mine Hazards within Range. When a creature moves within 3m of a rock mine, it homes in on them and deals a Tick of Rock-Type damage.

actions.name: Stealth Rock (Surge)
actions.description: Effect: The user places 10 floating rock mine Hazards within Range. When a creature moves within 3m of a rock mine, it homes in on them and deals a Tick of Rock-Type damage.
